extension.description:
Download and install unofficial Kodi add-ons from the TVADDONS.AG add-on repository. Please visit www.tvaddons.ag for addon support.
Kodi is a registered trademark of the XBMC Foundation. We are not connected to or in any other way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.
extension.disclaimer: TVADDONS.AG did not make all the add-ons in this repository and is not responsible for their content.
